div.p: Used to specify the type of address line encoded in addressLine.
Use one of the set values to specify the type of address line encoded in addressLine. Use the attribute localType in order to encode a local type of address line.
An attribute used to specify the type of address line encoded in addressLine, eg "street", "country" or "postalCode".
county, country, district, municipality, postBox, postalCode, region, street

div.egXML: <address> <addressLine languageOfElement="se"> Kungl. Hovstaterna </addressLine> <addressLine languageOfElement="se"> Kungl. Slottet </addressLine> <addressLine addressLineType="postalCode"> 10770 </addressLine> <addressLine languageOfElement="se" addressLineType="municipality"> Stockholm </addressLine> <addressLine languageOfElement="se" addressLineType="country"> Sverige </addressLine> <addressLine languageOfElement="en" addressLineType="country"> Sweden </addressLine> </address>
